title: [Rone Academy, Wizard's Retreat]
description: A dim light is kept throughout this wide chamber, supplied by glowing orbs that sit atop white marble columns in each corner of the room.  Scrolls and pieces of parchment are strewn about on various maoral work benches.  Cabinets stuffed with magical potions and arcane objects line the walls.  Low murmurs can be heard from a group of students surrounding a small work table.
